title: Indigenous Culture-Integrated ICT-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Fundamental Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment focused on enhancing mathematical problem-solving skills using ICT tools while respecting Indigenous learners' cultural identity, including activities linked to oral knowledge from community elders.

learning_goals: Solving three or more math problems using Indigenous life case studies in a collaborative online learning platform to enhance mathematical thinking skills
Analyzing Indigenous traditional patterns (e.g., weaving motifs) through geometric principles using ICT tools and reconstructing them as digital art
Strengthening self-directed learning competencies by exchanging peer feedback five or more times through formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
